publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

sense.def: aspire to be like; emulate

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Emperor Mu started out for the north

sense.def: in the north; from the north; towards the north, northwards 北面

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Emperor Mu started out for the north

sense.def: CC, LISAO: go on a very far expedition

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Emperor Mu started out for the north

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: by crossing the river Chang.

sense.def: cross (river); traverse

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: by crossing the river Chang.

sense.def: and thereupon, and then accordingly; then without delay;Then accordingly (often after a direct speech)

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: by crossing the river Chang.

sense.def: the River X

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: On the day mou-yin

sense.def: on the 15th day in the hexagesimal cycle

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Two days later, king-shen,

sense.def: on the 17th day in the hexagenary cycle

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: the company reached ...

sense.def: arrive at, turn up; get to (a place);

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: the company reached ...

sense.def: in

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: . . . the Emperor was entertained at a banquet on the Chüan Mountain.

sense.def: give something to drink (also to horses and dragons)

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: . . . the Emperor was entertained at a banquet on the Chüan Mountain.

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: . . . the Emperor was entertained at a banquet on the Chüan Mountain.

sense.def: the Mountain X

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: . . . the Emperor was entertained at a banquet on the Chüan Mountain.

sense.def: the upper side of; upon, on 泰山之上

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: where the emperor was entertained at a banquet by the people of this country upon a hill.

sense.def: treat to a drinking party; regale with food and wine

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: where the emperor was entertained at a banquet by the people of this country upon a hill.

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: where the emperor was entertained at a banquet by the people of this country upon a hill.

sense.def: in

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: where the emperor was entertained at a banquet by the people of this country upon a hill.

sense.def: the upper side of; upon, on 泰山之上

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: By the imperial command, the kuang music was sounded,

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: By the imperial command, the kuang music was sounded,

sense.def: (THE SUBJECT N) then (will VERB)

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: By the imperial command, the kuang music was sounded,

sense.def: to have music played

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: but the emperor himself did not alight from his chariot.

sense.def: set up one's army camp; stop for the night

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: but the emperor himself did not alight from his chariot.

sense.def: chariot

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: but the emperor himself did not alight from his chariot.

sense.def: not

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: The company then proceeded forward until they arrived at the foot of the Hsing Mountain.

sense.def: the Mountain X

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: The company then proceeded forward until they arrived at the foot of the Hsing Mountain.

sense.def: arrive at, turn up; get to (a place);

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: The company then proceeded forward until they arrived at the foot of the Hsing Mountain.

sense.def: in

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: The company then proceeded forward until they arrived at the foot of the Hsing Mountain.

sense.def: below

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: On the day kueu-wei

sense.def: on the 20th day in a hexagenary cycle

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: it snowed,

sense.def: it rains (e.g. locusts, snow, also: water)

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: it snowed,

sense.def: snow

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and the emperor went out hunting on the western range of the mountain.

sense.def: the (contextually determinate) Son of Heaven (of the time)

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and the emperor went out hunting on the western range of the mountain.

sense.def: hunt (as a professional hunter); go on a hunt, hunt as a pleasure excursion

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and the emperor went out hunting on the western range of the mountain.

sense.def: winding mountain ridge; sloping hill???

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and the emperor went out hunting on the western range of the mountain.

sense.def: western

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and the emperor went out hunting on the western range of the mountain.

sense.def: the Mountain X

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: and the emperor went out hunting on the western range of the mountain.

sense.def: in

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Crossing the valley of the mountain

sense.def: At that point, Whereupon; at that time; at this time

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Crossing the valley of the mountain

sense.def: thereafter, from then on, from that point onwards

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Crossing the valley of the mountain

sense.def: for 隧 "tunnel"

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Crossing the valley of the mountain

sense.def: find

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Crossing the valley of the mountain

sense.def: the Mountain X

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: Crossing the valley of the mountain

sense.def: cross (river); traverse

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: he followed a course north to the southern bank of the Ho-t’o River.

sense.def: in the north; from the north; towards the north, northwards 北面

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: he followed a course north to the southern bank of the Ho-t’o River.

sense.def: follow the course of (a shore, a river etc)

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: he followed a course north to the southern bank of the Ho-t’o River.

sense.def: north; north of a river; south of a mountain

tls:line.title: Translation of 穆天子傳 into (English)

tls:text.tls:line: It is said that

sense.def: one says; you say; it is said, as in 故曰 "thus it is said", German: "Daher heisst es..." cf. MO 於《武觀》曰："In the Wǔguān IT says..." 於《仲虺之告》曰： 於先王之書《仲虺之告》曰：
